deleted_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the ad group criterion was deleted, if applicable.

change_status.last_change_date_time.description: The date and time of the last change made to the ad group criterion.

ad_group_criterion.resource_name.description: The resource name of the ad group criterion.

ad_group.id.description: The ID of the ad group associated with the criterion.

ad_group_criterion.criterion_id.description: The ID of the criterion defining the ad group criterion.

ad_group_criterion.listing_group.case_va.description: The country where the activity related to the ad group criterion takes place.
The ID of the activity related to the ad group criterion.
The rating of the activity related to the ad group criterion.
The city where the hotel related to the ad group criterion is located.
The class of the hotel related to the ad group criterion.
The country region where the hotel related to the ad group criterion is located.
The ID of the hotel related to the ad group criterion.
The state where the hotel related to the ad group criterion is located.
The ID of the category to which the product related to the ad group criterion belongs.
The category level of the product related to the ad group criterion.
The brand of the product related to the ad group criterion.
The channel where the product related to the ad group criterion is sold.
The exclusivity level of the product on its distribution channel related to the ad group criterion.
The condition of the product related to the ad group criterion.
The custom attribute index of the product related to the ad group criterion.
The custom attribute value of the product related to the ad group criterion.
The ID of the product item related to the ad group criterion.
The level of product type related to the ad group criterion.
The value of the product type related to the ad group criterion.

ad_group_criterion.listing_group.parent_.description: The parent ad group criterion of the current ad group criterion.

ad_group_criterion.listing_group.type.description: The type of the listing group associated with the ad group criterion.
